page.title: 16CARDINNIS WOODS
page.content:
I live opposite the Cardinnis woods. This wood is under threat of being made into a by-pass.The by-pass will go through these woods.I am very sad because I have lived opposite these woods ever since I was born.There is a cool stream running through it.The fields every year grow daffodils, strawberries and cabbages.It is lovely to walk through these woods.Woods now in Britain are very scarce.I hope I will still enjoy it for years to come so I hope that it will not be turned into a by-pass.Most of the trees in these woods are deciduous. It is very pleasurable to walk through these woods on a hot day because the lovely trees shade you from the sun.
Alv.
